var db = { loadData: function(filter) { return $.grep(this.records, function(row) { var f = true; Object.keys(filter).forEach(function (filterName) { var colFilter = filter[filterName]; var colValue = row[filterName]; if (!colFilter) { return } if($.type(colValue) !== "string") { return f = (colFilter === colValue); } if (colFilter && colValue.toLowerCase().indexOf(colFilter.toLowerCase()) < 0){ return f = false; } }); return f; }); }, records: [] };
